page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content:
Primary education for children living in our area is available at {The {Clinton School,Merton }. Children can start attending this school at the begining of the term during which they become 5.
Before 1962 when this school was built on land provided by {Lord {Clinton},children attended four schools situated in each of the four contributory parishes.
When the children of the four parishes reach secondary school age they are offered a place at Great Torrington School.Some choose to attend private schools.
Tertiary education is available at the North Devon College in Barnstaple.
